summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 23, 2019. It records the official inmate count and includes a specific entry for an inmate in the hospital with a suicide watch code, which is significant given Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total of 776 inmates. The count sheet includes a specific entry for an inmate assigned to the hospital with a suicide watch code.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 23, 2019, approximately two and a half weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
An inmate roster entry shows an inmate assigned to the hospital with the operational category 'HOSP' and a group code 'SUICIDE OR'.
The total inmate count for the facility was recorded as 776, with a verification count of 775.
The document is a standard Bureau of Prisons administrative form for tracking inmate populations and assignments.
The presence of a suicide watch code on the roster is notable in the context of Epstein's later death being ruled a suicide.
